channel.title: Blazier on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Blazier on Chaotic Online

item.title: Allmageddon
item.description: In this episode we’ll know the story of Hoton, a Creature that, seeking for an ancient power to protect everything and everyone he loved, ended up losing everything.

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: Chasm Quest
item.description: In this episode Tom finally decides to explore the Prexxor Chasm, in Perim, from the scan he got from CodeMaster Crellan until he realizes that something is really wrong.

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: Gigantempopolis
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Gigantempopolis, a desert place, full of mysteries, treasures and, of course, curses, in the best The Lord of the Rings style.

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom

item.title: Perithon!
item.description: In this episode, after an intense battle and glorious victory over the M’arrillians, the Tribes decide to keep Tribal Alliance towards a prosperous Perim and, to celebrate the peace, they make a car race… but old habits die hard…

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the previous episode, after having his battle plan ruined because of the mighty Cromaxx, Tom needs to figure out a way to workaround the situation in this epic battle.

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.
